original_title: Cannibal Vampire School Girls from Outer Space
overview: This Independent Motion Picture tells the tale of six sisters from Vamptar, a planet far, far away.  These sexy school girls come to earth, seduce, kill, eat the flesh and drink the blood of their young victims.  If you like the works of David Lynch, John Waters and Ed Wood you will love this movie!
title: Cannibal Vampire School Girls from Outer Space
